
## Tech Stack
- WordPress
- WooCommerce
- PHP 8.1
- MySQL 8.4
- jQuery

## Code Approach:
- MVC architecture.
- Use WP_List_Table for admin tables.
- Use **REST API** to decouple frontend and backend.
- Modern styling with pure CSS.

## 📁 Project Structure
/spider-rewards/
├── includes/
├── assets/
│   ├── js/rewards.js
│   └── css/rewards.css
│   └── libs/
├── templates/
├── spider-rewards.php
